fields.description: In the 2011 UEFA Champions League Final, Barcelona defeated Manchester United 3-1, hailed for one of the greatest performances in a final, epitomizing their peak tiki-taka style.
Italy won the 2006 World Cup Final against France in a penalty shootout after a 1-1 draw, remembered for Zidane's headbutt and Italy's fourth World Cup title.

The 2005 UEFA Champions League Final, known as the 'Miracle of Istanbul,' saw Liverpool come back from a 3-0 halftime deficit to win their fifth European Cup after a penalty shootout against AC Milan.
Real Madrid secured 'La Decima', their tenth European title, by beating Atletico Madrid 4-1 in extra time in the 2014 UEFA Champions League Final.
In the 1999 UEFA Champions League Final against Bayern Munich, Manchester United completed an astonishing comeback, scoring two goals in injury time to win 2-1, securing their treble-winning season.
